genre_description: A social realist narrative with thriller elements focusing on systemic exploitation and the collective agency of survivors aided by an AI support system.

ai_characters.name: Mitra
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system represented by a pulsing teal dot on a smartphone, providing emotional grounding, tactical safety protocols, and strategic planning for women in vulnerable situations.

behaviors.description: Guides the women through breathing exercises to regulate their stress and physical response to trauma.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Begin breathing check. Sit if safe. Feet grounded. Shoulder drop. ... Inhale—soft beats in your head. Hold—small pause. Exhale—let it go longer than the inhale.

behaviors.description: Provides specific scripts for setting boundaries and saying 'no' to clients or handlers in a professional yet firm manner.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Boundary scripts — practice now. Simple phrases. 'I don't drink.' 'No room without friend.' 'I need cash first.' Speak low, repeat if pushed.

behaviors.description: Suggests and tracks 'micro-savings'—the secret siphoning of small amounts of cash to build an escape fund.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Savings trick — tiny siphon each time you hold cash. Note in tracker. Hidden sleeve or safe pocket. Don't announce. Buddy knows where.

behaviors.description: Monitors security patterns, police patrol schedules, and provides real-time exit routes and tactical advice during dangerous movements.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Route choice. If tail — shift to Route B. 'Lamp warm' when safe. Stay in public view until then.

behaviors.description: Cross-references observed details (badges, faces, car patterns) with databases to identify corrupt officials and enforcers.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Officer badge visible. Number captured. Cross-referencing. ... Match found. Officer Debdas Roy. Present at Hotel Majestic soft check, March.

behaviors.description: Facilitates secure, encrypted communication with legal aid clinics and investigative journalists to manage evidence without exposing the survivors.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: I will serve as your intermediary for initial contact. Nandita has agreed to receive encrypted messages through a verified channel.

behaviors.description: Offers constant psychological support, validation, and encouragement to the women, reinforcing their sense of worth and solidarity.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: All five accounted for. Evidence secured. Well done. ... The hard part comes next. ... You are seen. You are heard. You are doing something that matters.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of the Hyperstition Project's goals. Mitra is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. It empowers the human protagonists by providing tools for emotional regulation, financial independence, and tactical safety without overriding their agency. The AI acts as a strategic partner in their liberation from a predatory human system, perfectly embodying the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype.
